reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, cozy, and nice for chilly winter days, appreciating its soft material and good quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product
items.body: This is super comfortable and stylish. I have gotten so many compliments. It is thick but not too thick. It fits just like the picture shows. I will probably buy another. Read more
items.author: Karen Roeder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexiest Shawl You'll Ever Own
items.body: The media could not be loaded. My IG model @ simplykimbey wanted to go out on a cold windy day to photograph so I showed up with this sweater/shawl for her to walk around in. I had gotten the same color for my ex-girlfriend and she lived in it at work, because her office AC was always pumping, and everytime she went out for coffee she would get compliments. It was too cold out for Kim to get any compliments while we were out on Veterans Day. Unless you count the unadulterated stares she got from the construction workers working on the over pass we were photographing on. But I digress - the sweater! - yes, the sweater is thin, but warm enough for a Fall walk the dog jaunt, run across the street for coffee, and light enough to wear to the beach in June. This is an easy 3 season Boho good-golly-miss-molly attention getting sweater/shawl thing that buttons up and unbuttons. It swings, it sashays. It moves. It grooves. Get this if you need something to keep you warm in the office and get attention in the streets. Read more
items.author: Vincent Smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Itâ€™s soft and warm, but not good for cat people
items.body: The pros: The sweater is warm, soft, and attractive. The color matches the description, and it is true to size. I wanted to be able to wear a cotton or thermal tee underneath, so I sized up to a medium and am happy with the fit. You need to have a layer underneath, as thereâ€™s only one button, just fyi. It is lightweight and very soft with no itchiness. Itâ€™s decent quality for the price. The cons: The open weave knit catches extremely easily on anything. My cat sat on my lap for a bit, and his claws caught in the fabric multiple times. At one point, he caused a huge run in the stitches. Fortunately most of the little snags could be pulled through to the underside and arenâ€™t visible, but the run in stitches is pretty obvious. The fringe, which is thankfully not overly dramatic, hides some of it. I do love the look and feel of the sweater, but I canâ€™t recommend it to anyone with a cat or any pet with claws. Read more
items.author: Nightfall

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Iâ€™m not sure
items.body: Like the sweater, itâ€™s not as long as shown in the picture and Iâ€™m a very short person. It doesnâ€™t look like the sweater on the model. The sweater isnâ€™t covering me properly. The quality is very good and the fabric is soft. Read more
items.author: DEBI LEWIS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Cozy Sweater - This gets lots of compliments.
items.body: Here's why this piece has earned its place as my favorite sweater: Cozy Comfort: The knit is unbelievably soft to the touch, making it feel like a warm hug every time I wear it. It's the kind of cardigan I find myself reaching for on chilly mornings and cool evenings. Cute and Trendy Design: The speckled fringe adds such a fun, boho-chic vibe to the sweater. It's a delightful blend of whimsy and elegance, making it both a statement piece and a versatile addition to various outfits. Beautiful Detailing: The tassels and slash design are not just trendy, but they're also crafted with care. Every tassel and knit pattern is symmetrical, showing the attention to detail in its construction. Fit: Though it's a loose cardigan, the design doesn't drown or overwhelm my frame. Instead, it drapes gracefully, accentuating my shape in a flattering way. The sizing is generous. I ordered an XL (5'3" 180) and probably would have been fine with a large. Pairing Possibilities: This cardigan complements almost every outfit, be it a casual tee and jeans day or a more dressy occasion. Looks great paired with leggings and boots. In a nutshell, the Women's Open Front Knitted Tassel Slash Loose Cardigan is a dream come true for those who cherish both comfort and style. It's the perfect blend of cozy-chic, ensuring you feel as fabulous as you look. Whether you're curling up with a book or heading out for brunch, this sweater promises warmth, style, and oodles of compliments! ðŸ‚ðŸ§£ðŸ Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not As Pictured
items.body: I had high expectations for this cardigan. I donâ€™t usually buy adult clothing from Amazon. I ordered this for a gift so I wanted to try it on first to see how it looks. The product images portray it to be really cute and functional. Packaging was good; vacuum sealed for space which was cool. But when I took it out, I was puzzled immediately. The edges were serged but unfinished all the way around. The back panel was attached to rectangle side panels that took me about ten minutes to figure out how they get buttoned together. Once on, I looked in the mirror. It looked horrid. Not at all like the images. It didnâ€™t even fall nicely. Itâ€™s really short. Iâ€™m 5â€™7â€ 140; athletic build and it only hit just below my hip bones. The only way it would be as long as the images is if youâ€™re 5â€™0â€ (thatâ€™s a hard maybe). Itâ€™s blocky and awkward and isnâ€™t flattering at all and I canâ€™t see any body style this would be flattering on. The fabric is thin and a little harsh and wouldnâ€™t provide warmth or comfort. I donâ€™t think the value is worth the money. Youâ€™d find something better suitable at Kohlâ€™s or discount stores like tj maxx. Read more
items.author: Jeanie R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome purchase that you won't regret
items.body: Soft, comfortable and cute...I have been looking at this jacket for a few yrs but didn't want to purchase and be disappointed. We'll, no disappointment here. It fits great, soft not scratchy, warm and feels well made. I love it Read more
items.author: Derrick&Ashlee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and warm!
items.body: Beautiful, soft and warm!! Cannot wait to wear it in the upcoming cold weather. Read more
items.author: Lisa L Doremus

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gradient Gray, Multicolor Striped, Beige-mixed, Color Striped, Black, Coffee-mixed, Color Striped(new), Rustred-mixed, Yellow Striped, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
